definitions.definition: To bring (a thing) up to date .
examples: I need to update my records to take account of the most recent transaction.

definitions.definition: To bring (a person) up to date: to inform (a person) about recent developments.
examples: Update me on what happened while I was away.

main_definition: ( transitive ) To bring (a thing) up to date .
secondary_definitions: ( transitive ) To bring (a person) up to date: to inform (a person) about recent developments.
